common.howToBook: How do I book a ticket?
common.howToBookAnswer: To book a ticket, simply use the search form on the homepage. Enter your departure and arrival locations, select your date, and click "Search Buses". Then, choose your preferred trip and select your seat(s) on the booking page.
common.canICancelAnswer: In a real application, you would be able to cancel your ticket from your profile page, subject to our cancellation policy. This is a mock feature.
common.amenitiesAvailable: What amenities are available on the bus?
common.amenitiesAvailableAnswer: Amenities vary by bus operator and route. You can find details about amenities like Wi-Fi, power outlets, and restrooms on the trip details section of the booking page.
common.lookForwardToHearing: We look forward to hearing from you!
common.aboutUsContent1: Welcome to BusTicket, your number one source for booking bus tickets online. We're dedicated to giving you the very best of bus travel, with a focus on reliability, customer service, and unique travel experiences.
common.aboutUsContent2: Founded in 2025, BusTicket has come a long way from its beginnings. When we first started out, our passion for making bus travel easier and more accessible drove us to start our own business, and gave us the impetus to turn hard work and inspiration into to a booming online bus ticket booking platform.
common.aboutUsContent3: We hope you enjoy our services as much as we enjoy offering them to you. If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact us.
